DOC.detailed_description: This randomize , double-blinded , placebo-controlled trial evaluate fenoldopam N-acetylcysteine ( NAC ) individually , together , renal protective agent patient renal insufficiency undergo heart surgery . Subjects chronic renal insufficiency creatinine clearance ( CrCl ) < /= 40cc/min pre-operative dialysis , receive : NAC 600 mg mouth ( po ) twice day ( bid ) placebo start 24 hour pre-operative continue day surgery ; and/or fenoldopam 0.1 mcg/kg/min intravenous ( IV ) saline placebo anesthetic induction continue 48 hour . Outcome data include : nadir , post-operative day 3 post-operative day 14 CrCl , time CrCl nadir , length Intensive Care Unit ( ICU ) stay , length post-operative hospital stay , hospital cost , mortality , need hemodialysis . Intraoperative post-operative pressor use monitor . The enrollment include 80 patient ( 20 group ) .
